name: Engage Interactive
description: Established back in 2007 we’ve since grown to a talented team of 25, with everyone working full-time, from our office in the heart of Leeds. We’re experts in delivering innovative, agile digital solutions to forward-thinking organisations. Our refreshing way of working has achieved results for some of the UK’s most successful brands. We’re a mixed bunch from cyclists to cricketers, painters to percussionists but are united by a passion for all things digital... and the odd piece of cake.

locations.address: First Floor Munro House Duke Street
